title: Missing platform field in composer events
Missing SQLiteBatchWriter import in server.py
description: File: src/processing/server.py:67. Server crash on startup - NameError. SQLiteBatchWriter is referenced but never imported.

title: Bare except clause in raw_traces_writer.py
description: File: src/processing/cursor/raw_traces_writer.py:87-96. Bare except catches all exceptions including SystemExit/KeyboardInterrupt.

title: Async/sync mixing in watchdog callback
description: File: src/processing/cursor/unified_cursor_monitor.py:262-264. asyncio.create_task called from watchdog thread causes RuntimeError.

title: Wrong timestamp type in session_monitor
description: File: src/processing/cursor/session_monitor.py:568. Uses monotonic time instead of wall-clock time.

title: Post-deletion cache access in jsonl_monitor cleanup
description: File: src/processing/claude_code/jsonl_monitor.py:550-556. workspace_cache accessed after deletion, cleanup fails silently.

title: Hardcoded session ID prefix in event_consumer
